sentences.en: All items are to be collected at The Dragon Foundation Secretariat.
sentences.cn: 所购义卖物品须于龙传基金秘书处领取.

sentences.en: Association secretariat consists of: integrated Department, Information Department, Member Department, Training Department.
sentences.cn: 协会秘书处下设: 综合部 、 息部 、 员部 、 训部.

sentences.en: Conference Secretariat will send tickets to above address in due course.
sentences.cn: 研讨会秘书处将于稍后把门票邮寄到以上地址.

sentences.en: Copies of these publications shall also be made available to the Secretariat.
sentences.cn: 这些出版物的副本应可使秘书处获得.

sentences.en: I agree with the way the Secretariat has been doing this work.
Notifications to the Secretariat shall be in English, French or Spanish.
sentences.cn: 提交秘书处的通知应使用英文 、 法文或西班牙文.

sentences.en: Please deliver suggestions or comments to Secretariat asas possible.
sentences.cn: 请各理事单位尽快提出意向以便于秘书处协调,为更快更好的开展工作.

sentences.en: Secretariat of Shandong Comparative Literature Association is located at the institute.
sentences.cn: 山东省比较文学学会秘书处设在本所.

sentences.en: Students tried to barge into the secretariat buildings.
sentences.cn: 学生们试图闯进秘书处的办公大楼。

sentences.en: The CCC Secretariat shall act as the secretariat to the Technical Committee.
sentences.cn: CCC秘书处应担任委员会的秘书处.

sentences.en: The Secretariat shall inform the Members of the availability of this information.
sentences.cn: 秘书处应将该信息的可获性通知各成员.

sentences.en: The Secretariat shall prepare name card with the above information.
sentences.cn: 秘书处会以以上资料准备阁下之名牌.

sentences.en: the United Nations Secretariat in New York
sentences.cn: 设在纽约的联合国秘书处

sentences.en: The WTO Secretariat shall act as the secretariat to the Committee.
sentences.cn: WTO秘书处担任委员会的秘书处.

sentences.en: Why are you joining forces with the ovement's secretariat?
sentences.cn: 你们为什么要和秘书处的家伙们站在一边?

words.tran_cn: 书记、秘书等的职务或任期

trans.tran_cn: 秘书处，书记处，秘书，秘书之职
trans.tran_en: a government office or the office of a large international organization, especially one that has a  secretary general  in charge of it
